Description: Fragment of neck and flattened handle, with gradual curve, of a Knidian pottery transport amphora. Clay medium red-brown. Heart-shaped stamp with star symbol.
Type series: KT19 (Virginia Grace's unpublished K(nidian) T(ype) series)
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (290)
